reviewText: Excellent film.  Not as good as the remake, but there wouldn't have been a remake if it hadn't been for the original.
A Japanese classic with enough action, plot depth, and character development to satisfy.
It's a good movie and it's fun fun to compare to the recent re-make.
Better than the remake. Chiezo Kitaoka was a very good actor in his time. I bought the whole the trilogy. a very good set to see.
